title.narrative: La Guajira Water & Sanitation Infrastructure and Service Management Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is "to improve the quality of water supply and sanitation services in urban, peri-urban, and rural areas of the Borrower's territory by: (a) supporting utility institutional performance through the use of "specialized operators"; and (b) delivering the necessary water and sanitation infrastructure.”

participating-org.narrative: Administracion Temporal Sector de Agua Potable y Saneamiento Basico de La Guajira
Department of La Guajira with the Guarantee of the Republic of Colombia
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
